## Research

My research lies within the field of Theoretical Computer Science. I naturally gravitate toward algorithms and data structures, particularly when applied to problems in computational geometry. My interest in research grew from my experiences in computer science education, which reshaped how I think about learning and inspired me to pursue a PhD.
